name: Your Earth
description:
The year is 2015, and climate change is a more pressing issue than ever. Sent on a mission to save the planet, you must stop forest fires, melting icecaps and oil spills across the globe. If Earth is kept in good condition by 2025, you save the planet. It is up to YOU to take action and save Your Earth.

WASD to navigate the globe.

Mouse to operate cursor, left click to select.
